page.title: 09Life Styles
page.content: By David Sharp Three Bridges Middle School. On Saturday the 22nd.June 1985 I awoke quite early because like every other saturday morning I was going Ten Pin Bowling. I sat up in my bed and looked out of the window,it was a dull overcast day more like November.The garden looked damp and miserable. The rain of the past few days had spoiled the flower and tree blossom, everything was a different shade of green. After my Breakfst I walked from my home in Forge Road into Crawley. Most of the houses are identical as they are all council houses, but I could see that some people had new windows and doors which meant that they had bought their houses like my family had.As i approached the Bowling Alley I could see its bright yellow door and luminous sign saying"bowling"
